    S

    S_TO_NS_CONVERSION_FACTOR - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.dynamic.DynamicObject
    A constant factor for converting seconds to nanoseconds (1 second = 1e9 nanoseconds).
    Scalable - org.kelvinizer.support.interfaces中的接口
    This interface defines how to scale an object that implements it when the window is resized.

    ScoreData - org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow中的类
    Represents the score data for a game session, including the player's score, maximum combo, accuracy, worst hit time, and whether the player achieved a full combo (FC) or is playing a new chart.

    State indicating the settings action.
    SettingsCRectButtons - org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.settingbuttons中的类
    The SettingsCRectButtons class handles the functionality and rendering of the setting buttons used to toggle user-specific settings such as sync, FC/AP (Full Combo/ All Perfect) hints, and hand hints.
    SettingsCRectButtons() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.settingbuttons.SettingsCRectButtons
    Constructs a SettingsCRectButtons instance and initializes the buttons for the settings: sync, FCAP hints, and hand hints.
    SettingsGeneralButton - org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.settingbuttons中的类
    The SettingsGeneralButton class represents the general buttons used for settings navigation and actions, such as the back button, and the move left and move right buttons.
    SettingsGeneralButton() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.settingbuttons.SettingsGeneralButton
    Constructs a SettingsGeneralButton instance and initializes the back, move left, and move right buttons by setting their appearance and behavior.
    SettingsSlidingButton - org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.settingbuttons中的类
    The SettingsSlidingButton class represents the sliding buttons used in the settings menu to control values such as tolerance and music delay.
    SettingsSlidingButton() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.settingpage.settingbuttons.SettingsSlidingButton
    Constructs a SettingsSlidingButton instance and initializes the tolerance and music delay sliding buttons by setting their appearance and behavior.
